original_title: Formation Flying Does More Than Look Good
original_content:
Seeing airplanes fly in formation is an exciting experience at something like an air show, where demonstrations of a pilots skill and aircraft technology are on full display. But there are other reasons for aircraft to fly in formation as well. [Peter] has been exploring the idea that formation flight can also improve efficiency, and has been looking specifically at things like formation flight of UAVs or drones with this flight planning algorithm.
Aircraft flying in formation create vortices around the wing tips, which cause drag. However, another aircraft flying through those vortices will experience less drag and more efficient flight. This is the reason birds instinctively fly in formation as well. By planning paths for drones which will leave from different locations, meet up at some point to fly in a more efficient formation, and then split up close to their destinations, a significant amount of energy can potentially be saved.
[Peter] is using a modified version of the RRT* algorithm which generates nodes for viable flight paths, and then uses the various paths found to map out potential shared flight paths. Another consideration that had to be accounted for was the actual energy savings factor for the shared section of the flight paths. For birds its estimated that the energy savings is around 70%, but varying this amount even for idential simulations often yields surprising results. Even with only a 5% energy savings, the flight paths can change dramatically.
For now this idea exists mostly in the world of simulations, as UAVs and drones havent yet reached a critical mass where so many are flying around autonomously that these factors need to be taken into account. Its certainly a viable future though as companies like Amazon look to automate more of their logistical processes, but this is only one of several ways to improve service and cut costs.
title: ドローンの飛行効率を改善する方法として、編隊飛行を利用する
body: 形態を揃えた飛行機の飛行は、パイロットスキルと飛行機技術のデモンストレーションがある航空ショーのような場所でエキサイティングな経験です。しかし、航空機が形態を揃えて飛行する別の理由もあります。この飛行計画アルゴリズムを使用して、UAVやドローンの形態飛行も効率を改善できると考えられています。さまざまな飛行軌道を生成し、効率的な形態を飛行させるために、共有された飛行軌道をマップ化するために、RRT*アルゴリズムの修正バージョンを使用しています。しかし、まだシミュレーションの段階で、実際のエネルギーの節約に関してまだ詳しくは調べられていません。
titles: ドローンの飛行効率を改善する方法として、編隊飛行を利用する
鳥が編隊飛行をするのと同様、ドローンの編隊飛行もエネルギーを節約できる
RRT*アルゴリズムを用い、ドローンの飛行経路を最適化する
ドローンの編隊飛行が実現すれば、物流業界においてコスト削減が可能になる
ドローンの編隊飛行は、未来の自律飛行機において有効な技術になる可能性がある
